    Useful links

    Annotated and curated list of links to forums, repositories for training material, etc

    • image.sc: Questions and answers in bioimage analysis using open-source software
    • BIAflows: A BioImage Analysis workflows benchmarking platform
    • Biii: BioImage Informatics Index - annotated list of software, modules, and workflows

    Journals that focus on bioimage analysis

    • F1000R NEUBIAS Gateway
    • Frontiers in Bioinformatics, Computational BioImaging
    • Biological Imaging

    Open-source Software & Materials

    Fiji “Fiji is just ImageJ”

    • On GitHub w. links to plugins also on Github
    • ImageJ tutorials (lists)
    • Presentation slides

    Qupath: platform for whole slide image analysis.

    • Tutorials on youTube

    CellProfiler

    • Tutorials

    Qu - DeepLearning & Napari

    “Qu is an attempt to make the full deep learning workflow more interactive by providing a user interface that abstracts all steps from ground truth generation and curation to training and prediction.”
